wallet_list_empty_noti: Your transaction and history will show up here
wallet_nowallet_des: Now you can explore blockchain multisig wallet
home_noti_text:
All recommended merchants have been selected and verified by us. They all promised to use our surety service during all transactions with you to keep your money safe.
If any merchant ask you not to use our surety service, please do NOT trade with them and tell us immediately to avoid possible lost!
home_create_wallet_noti_title: You need create a wallet or import a wallet before continue.
home_create_wallet_noti_content: Wallet address is your only identity when you use Uoobal Wallet. Please create or import a wallet account before you start. And for convenience you can create or import more than one wallet account.
担保协议占位: Please enter the surety protocol, which will be used as the reference for judgment in future disputes.
普通担保tag1: The risk of the operator runaway
普通担保des: The deposit funds are kept in Uoobal Wallet operator's wallet, and the funds are fully controlled by us.
多签担保tag1: No risk of the operator runaway
多签担保des: The deposit funds are kept in the 2/3 multi-sig crypto wallet, the funds only can be transferred out when two of the three parties(initiator, participant and operator/us) sign the transaction.
多签手续费内容:
·The fee is not charged by us, but be paid to TRON official as the gas fee.

·Using the multi-sig wallet provided by the TRON blockchain official. TRON charges around 15 USDT for the creation of the multi-sig wallet. This is one-time cost and it is non-refundable.

·Before apply a new multi-sig surety, you need send us the multi-sig creating fee(15 USDT) firstly. We will pay to TRON official and apply to create a multi-sig wallet for you after we have received the fee from you.
多签第二部提示说明: You need transfer 15 USDT to us now because you chose using multi-sig to keep your funds safe. It is charged by TRON official to create a multi-sig wallet as the gas fee.
转账凭证说明:
Please enter the exact amount including all decimals when you transfer money.
The decimal part is the verification code to confirm whether your payment is received.
扫码说明: Please scan the QR code using any wallet you want
请输入手续费: Please input the network gas fee
发起担保确认转账标题: Did you already transfer the creating fee to us?
发起担保确认转账内容:
If you didn't transfer the fee but you said you already transferred, it will affect your credit score.
Our system will finish the creation of the multi-sig wallet within 5 minutes when we received your fee.
邀请对方加入小喇叭: Please send the surety ID or QR code to the counterpart
邀请对方加入: Invite the counterpart to join in
加入担保小喇叭: Input the surety ID or scan the QR code to search
查询失败提示: Search failed, please check whether the surety ID is correct.
加入担保同意: I understand it will be used as the reference for judgment in future disputes
成功加入担保弹窗标题: Congratulations! You have joined in the surety guarantee {}.
成功加入担保弹窗内容:
·Now your new surety guarantee is already in 'My Surety Guarantees' list under 'Me'；

·In order to protect your money, please ensure that your counterpart has fulfilled all commitments to you before approving the release of the deposit funds.
取消担保弹窗标题: Are you sure to cancel this surety guarantee?
取消担保弹窗内容:
If you want to change the surety amount or the protocol content, please click the 'Modify' button;
Of course you can initiate a new surety guarantee after you have cancelled this one if you really want.
等待多签钱包创建中内容: We are creating multisig wallet for you now, please wait a while.
上押小喇叭提示: Based on blockchain 2/3 multi-sig wallet, keep your deposit funds 100% safe.
什么是2-3钱包内容:
Multi-sig wallet is a cryptocurrency wallet controlled by blockchain smart contract. No one can transfer out the funds in the multi-sig wallet excepting there are already multiple signatures more than the minimum requirement.

The 2/3 multi-sig wallet we used here is controlled together by three parties (initiator, participant and operator/us). The funds in this multi-sig wallet only can be transferred out if there are at least two of three parties already agreed and signatured.
您已经完成押金上传了吗: Did you already transfer all the deposit to us?
您已经完成押金上传了吗内容:
Please confirm that all depoist already completed before you click 'Finished';
It will affect your account's credit score if you click 'Finished' but you didn't transfer enough funds to deposit.
创建钱包第一步的标题: This secret phrase is the master key to your wallet.
创建钱包第一步的子标题: Tap on all checkboxes if you already understand the importance of your secret phrase.
创建钱包第一步按钮1: If I forgot my secret phrase, my funds will be lost forever.
创建钱包第一步按钮2: If I expose or share my secret phrase to anyone, my funds can be stolen.
创建钱包第一步按钮3: Uoobal Wallet customer service will NEVER ask you for the secret phrase.
创建钱包第二部提醒: Write or copy your secret phrase, and then store it in a secure location.
创建钱包第二步红字: Never share your secret phrase with anyone, otherwise they will gain full access to your wallet!
接收Token警告: Send only {} to this address, or you might lose your funds.
验证助记词顶部提示: Tap the words to put them next to each other in the correct order.
创建钱包成功子标题: Now you can explore Uoobal Wallet
导入说明: Typically 12(sometimes 18, 24) words separated by single spaces
创建钱包第二步提醒: Write or copy your secret phrase, and then store it in a secure location.
解押通知: You have requested release, and the counterpart will receive a system notification immediately.
解押通知内容: If the counterpart has no any response within 2 hours, you can try to contact him directly. And you can also contact us if you want.
您已成功取消解押申请: You have successfully cancelled your release request.
您已成功取消解押申请内容: You can request release again if you want.
您确定要同意这个解押申请吗: Are you sure to approve this release request?
您确定要同意这个解押申请吗内容: If confirmed, it means that this surety guarantee has been finished, and there is no any more dispute between you and the counterpart.
您已批准对方的解押申请: You have approved this release request.
您已批准对方的解押申请内容: The refund will arrive within 5 minutes. Thank you for using Uoobal Wallet surety service!
上押温馨提示:
The gas fee for this transfer is about 10 TRX.
The balance of your account is {} TRX.
Please make sure you have enough TRX, otherwise the transfer may fail.
请填写有效邮箱: Please fill in a valid email address
6位小数提醒:
Please enter the exact amount including all decimals when you transfer money.
The decimal part is the verification code to confirm whether your payment is received.
正确6为小数: Please enter the correct 6 decimal places.
您同意这个仲裁方法吗: Do you agree to this arbitration method?
仲裁弹窗内容: If confirmed, please indicate that you agree to the platform's plan to release the guarantee funds
担保费用收费标准内容:
Guarantee fee = Guarantee amount * 0.1% * Guarantee days
 The guarantee fee is calculated at a rate of 0.1% per day
 The part of the guarantee period that is less than 1 day is calculated as 1 day
 The part of the guarantee fee that is less than 1U is calculated as 1U
发起人和参与人输入的金额之和必须等于可解押金额: The sum of the amounts entered by the initiator and participants must equal the amount that can be released!
请输入钱包收款地址: Please enter the wallet payment address
首页弹窗1: Uoobal uses your cryptocurrency wallet as a system account credential. Please create or import at least one cryptocurrency wallet first.
需要先创建或导入钱包: You need to create or import a wallet first
当前账户没有待上押担保订单: There are no pending collateral orders for the current account
其他钱包转入提示语: When transferring funds, please enter the full 6 digits after the decimal point. This is the key voucher to confirm whether your transfer has been received.
输入金额不能大于上押金额: The input amount cannot be greater than the deposit amount
付手续费提示语: You have chosen multi-signature guarantee to ensure the safety of funds. You need to transfer %@U handling fee to us first. This handling fee is not collected by us, but is the gas fee used for TRON's official multi-signature wallet creation.
